#include <Servo.h> 
 
Servo LAR;  
Servo RAR;
Servo LAP;
Servo RAP;
Servo LKP;
Servo RKP;
Servo LHP;
Servo RHP;

//Angles for Knee Bending
int Rhip[]={95, 95.0570795286238, 95.2278837048169, 95.5111126056640, 95.9046106882114, 96.4053831944503, 97.0096189432334, 97.7127193356651, 98.5093333532153, 99.3933982822018, 100.358185854702, 101.396353454734, 102.500000000000, 103.660726073890, 104.869697850115, 106.117714323462, 107.395277334996, 108.692663858785, 110, 111.307336141215, 112.604722665004, 113.882285676538, 115.130302149885, 116.339273926111, 117.500000000000, 118.603646545266, 119.641814145298, 120.606601717798, 121.490666646785, 122.287280664335, 122.990381056767, 123.594616805550, 124.095389311789, 124.488887394336, 124.772116295183, 124.942920471376, 125};
int Rknee[]={97, 97.1065484534311, 97.4253829156582, 97.9540768639061, 98.6886066179946, 99.6233819629738, 100.751288694036, 102.063742759908, 103.550755592669, 105.201010126777, 107.001946928777, 108.939859782171, 111, 113.166688671260, 115.423435986881, 117.753066737129, 120.137851025326, 122.559639203066, 125, 127.440360796934, 129.862148974674, 132.246933262871, 134.576564013119, 136.833311328740, 139, 141.060140217829, 142.998053071223, 144.798989873223, 146.449244407331, 147.936257240092, 149.248711305964, 150.376618037026, 151.311393382005, 152.045923136094, 152.574617084342, 152.893451546569, 153};
int RankleP[]={92.5000000000000, 92.4505310751927, 92.3025007891587, 92.0570357417579, 91.7160040702168, 91.2820012314764, 90.7583302491977, 90.1489765757569, 89.4585777605467, 88.6923881554251, 87.8562389259250, 86.9564936725636, 86, 84.9940374026291, 83.9462618632337, 82.8646475863328, 81.7574263096701, 80.6330246557196, 79.5000000000000, 78.3669753442805, 77.2425736903299, 76.1353524136672, 75.0537381367663, 74.0059625973709, 73, 72.0435063274364, 71.1437610740750, 70.3076118445749, 69.5414222394533, 68.8510234242431, 68.2416697508023, 67.7179987685236, 67.2839959297832, 66.9429642582421, 66.6974992108413, 66.5494689248073, 66.5000000000000};
int Lhip[]={97, 96.9429204713762, 96.7721162951831, 96.4888873943360, 96.0953893117886, 95.5946168055498, 94.9903810567666, 94.2872806643349, 93.4906666467847, 92.6066017177982, 91.6418141452981, 90.6036465452657, 89.5000000000000, 88.3392739261105, 87.1303021498850, 85.8822856765378, 84.6047226650040, 83.3073361412149, 82, 80.6926638587851, 79.3952773349961, 78.1177143234622, 76.8696978501150, 75.6607260738895, 74.5000000000000, 73.3963534547343, 72.3581858547019, 71.3933982822018, 70.5093333532153, 69.7127193356651, 69.0096189432334, 68.4053831944503, 67.9046106882114, 67.5111126056640, 67.2278837048169, 67.0570795286238, 67};
int Lknee[]={90, 89.8934515465689, 89.5746170843418, 89.0459231360939, 88.3113933820054, 87.3766180370262, 86.2487113059643, 84.9362572400918, 83.4492444073314, 81.7989898732233, 79.9980530712231, 78.0601402178293, 76, 73.8333113287396, 71.5765640131187, 69.2469332628706, 66.8621489746741, 64.4403607969344, 62, 59.5596392030656, 57.1378510253260, 54.7530667371294, 52.4234359868813, 50.1666886712604, 48, 45.9398597821707, 44.0019469287769, 42.2010101267767, 40.5507555926686, 39.0637427599082, 37.7512886940357, 36.6233819629738, 35.6886066179946, 34.9540768639061, 34.4253829156582, 34.1065484534311, 34};
int LankleP[]={85, 85.0494689248073, 85.1974992108413, 85.4429642582421, 85.7839959297832, 86.2179987685236, 86.7416697508023, 87.3510234242431, 88.0414222394533, 88.8076118445749, 89.6437610740750, 90.5435063274364, 91.5000000000000, 92.5059625973709, 93.5537381367663, 94.6353524136672, 95.7425736903299, 96.8669753442805, 98, 99.1330246557196, 100.257426309670, 101.364647586333, 102.446261863234, 103.494037402629, 104.500000000000, 105.456493672564, 106.356238925925, 107.192388155425, 107.958577760547, 108.648976575757, 109.258330249198, 109.782001231476, 110.216004070217, 110.557035741758, 110.802500789159, 110.950531075193, 111};

//Angles for Load Shifting
int RankleRRight[]={90, 90.5111126056640, 92.0096189432334, 94.3933982822018, 97.5000000000000, 101.117714323462, 105, 108.882285676538, 112.500000000000, 115.606601717798, 117.990381056767, 119.488887394336, 120};
int LankleRRight[]={82.5000000000000, 82.8407417371093, 83.8397459621556, 85.4289321881345, 87.5000000000000, 89.9118095489748, 92.5000000000000, 95.0881904510252, 97.5000000000000, 99.5710678118655, 101.160254037844, 102.159258262891, 102.500000000000};
int RankleRLeft[]={90, 89.6592582628907, 88.6602540378444, 87.0710678118655, 85, 82.5881904510252, 80, 77.4118095489748, 75, 72.9289321881345, 71.3397459621556, 70.3407417371093, 70};
int LankleRLeft[]={82.5000000000000, 82.1592582628907, 81.1602540378444, 79.5710678118655, 77.5000000000000, 75.0881904510252, 72.5000000000000, 69.9118095489748, 67.5000000000000, 65.4289321881345, 63.8397459621556, 62.8407417371093, 62.5000000000000};

//Angles for Rising the Leg
int LeftAnkle[]={111, 111.187384425927, 111.714424780627, 112.482361909795, 113.347296355334, 114.147152872702, 114.732050807569, 114.992389396184};
int LeftHip[]={67, 66.2973084027749, 64.3209070726491, 61.4411428382689, 58.1976386674980, 55.1981767273672, 53.0048094716167, 52.0285397643119};
int LeftKnee[]={34, 33.1099239768482, 30.6064822920221, 26.9587809284739, 22.8503423121642, 19.0510238546651, 16.2727586640478, 15.0361503681284};
int RightAnkle[]={66.5000000000000, 66.3126155740733, 65.7855752193731, 65.0176380902050, 64.1527036446661, 63.3528471272979, 62.7679491924311, 62.5076106038165};
int RightHip[]={125, 125.702691597225, 127.679092927351, 130.558857161731, 133.802361332502, 136.801823272633, 138.995190528383, 139.971460235688};
int RightKnee[]={153, 153.890076023152, 156.393517707978, 160.041219071526, 164.149657687836, 167.948976145335, 170.727241335952, 171.963849631872};

void setup() {
  // put your setup code here, to run once:
  LAR.attach(3);  // attaches the servo on pin 9 to the servo object 
  RAR.attach(4);
  LAP.attach(5);
  RAP.attach(6);
  LKP.attach(7);
  RKP.attach(9);
  LHP.attach(10);
  RHP.attach(11);

  int i;
  //Knee Bending
  for (i=0; i<37; i=i+1){
    LHP.write(Lhip[i]);
    RHP.write(Rhip[i]);
    LKP.write(Lknee[i]);
    RKP.write(Rknee[i]);
    LAP.write(LankleP[i]);
    RAP.write(RankleP[i]);
    delay(20);
  }
  delay(2000);
  
//  //Load Shifting on Right Leg using Ankle Roll
//  for(i=0; i<13; i=i+1){
//    RAR.write(RankleRRight[i]);
//    LAR.write(LankleRRight[i]);
//    delay(50);
//  }
//  delay(2000);
//  
//  //Leg Raising of Left Leg
//  for(i=0; i<8; i=i+1){
//    LHP.write(LeftHip[i]);
//    LKP.write(LeftKnee[i]);
//    LAP.write(LeftAnkle[i]);
//    delay(20);
//  }
//  delay(2000);
//  
//  //Bringing Down Left Leg
//  for(i=7; i>=0; i=i-1){
//    LHP.write(LeftHip[i]);
//    LKP.write(LeftKnee[i]);
//    LAP.write(LeftAnkle[i]);
//    delay(20);
//  }
//  delay(2000);
//  
//  //Load At COM
//  for (i=12; i>=0; i=i-1){
//    RAR.write(RankleRRight[i]);
//    LAR.write(LankleRRight[i]);
//    delay(50);
//  }
//  delay(2000);
  
  //Load shifting on Left Leg
  for(i=0; i<13; i=i+1){
    LAR.write(LankleRLeft[i]);
    RAR.write(RankleRLeft[i]);
    delay(50);
  }
  delay(2000);
  
  //Right Leg Rising
  for(i=0; i<8; i=i+1){
    RHP.write(RightHip[i]);
    RKP.write(RightKnee[i]);
    RAP.write(RightAnkle[i]);
    delay(20);
  }
  delay(2000);
  
  //Bringing Right Leg Down
  for(i=7; i>=0; i=i-1){
    RHP.write(RightHip[i]);
    RKP.write(RightKnee[i]);
    RAP.write(RightAnkle[i]);
    delay(20);
  }
  delay(2000);
  
  //Load at Center
  for(i=12; i>=0; i=i-1){
    LAR.write(LankleRLeft[i]);
    RAR.write(RankleRLeft[i]);
    delay(50);
  }
  delay(2000);
  
  //Home Position
  for (i=36; i>=0; i=i-1){
    LHP.write(Lhip[i]);
    RHP.write(Rhip[i]);
    LKP.write(Lknee[i]);
    RKP.write(Rknee[i]);
    LAP.write(LankleP[i]);
    RAP.write(RankleP[i]);
    delay(20);
  }
  
}

void loop() {
  // put your main code here, to run repeatedly:

}
